title: Provided further that ornamental entrance gate with the height not less than 4
clause_text: Provided further that ornamental entrance gate with the height not less than 4.5m or as required for movement of fire Engine shall be permissible.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided further that ornamental entrance gate with the height not less than 4.5m or as required for movement of fire Engine shall be permissible.
